Package com.gniot.crs.dao

Interface StudentDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
StudentDAOImpl
@Service public interface StudentDAOInterface
StudentDAOInterface defines the data access operations that can be performed by a student in the course registration system.

  • Method Details

    • addStudent

      void addStudent(Student student)
      Adds a new student to the database.
      Parameters:
      student - the student to be added

    • findStudentByUsername

      String findStudentByUsername(String username, String password)
      Finds a student by username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the student
      password - the password of the student
      Returns:
      a String indicating the result of the search (e.g., "Student found" or "Student not found")

    • updateStudentPassword

      Boolean updateStudentPassword(String username, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Updates the password of a student.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the student
      oldPassword - the current password of the student
      newPassword - the new password to be set
      Returns:
      true if the password was updated successfully, false otherwise

    • checkUserName

      String checkUserName(String username)
      Checks if a username exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to be checked
      Returns:
      "Student already exists" if the username exists, "Student does not exist" otherwise

    • getCourses

      List<Course> getCourses()
      Retrieves the list of courses available for students.
      Returns:
      a list of Course objects representing the available courses

    • registerForCourse

      boolean registerForCourse(String username, int courseCode, String courseType)
      Registers a student for a specific course.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the student
      courseCode - the code of the course to be registered
      courseType - the type of the course
      Returns:
      true if the registration was successful, false otherwise

    • dropCourse

      boolean dropCourse(String username, int courseCode)
      Drops a registered course for a student.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the student
      courseCode - the code of the course to be dropped
      Returns:
      true if the course was dropped successfully, false otherwise

    • getCoursesWithGrades

      List<Map<String,Object>> getCoursesWithGrades(String username) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the courses with grades for a student.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the student
      Returns:
      a list of maps, where each map represents a course and its associated grade for the student
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is a database access error

    • getRegisteredCourses

      List<Map<String,Object>> getRegisteredCourses(String username) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the list of courses a student is registered for.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the student
      Returns:
      a list of maps, where each map represents a registered course for the student
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is a database access error

    • getStudentInfo

      Student getStudentInfo(String username) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the information of a student.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the student
      Returns:
      a Student object containing the student's information
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is a database access error

    • getCourseFee

      int getCourseFee(int courseCode) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the fee for a specific course.
      Parameters:
      courseCode - the code of the course
      Returns:
      the fee for the course
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is a database access error

    • updateStudentBalance

      void updateStudentBalance(String username, int totalCourseFee) throws SQLException
      Updates the balance of a student.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the student
      totalCourseFee - the total fee for the courses
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is a database access error
